name: 品牌管理
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BAU0021  行銷管理】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Understand brand management planning and execution procedures
Understand the importance of brand management to a business
Procedures for International Brand Management Planning
Train teamwork ability to complete brand management planning
syllabus:
W1 Opening session  
W2   Ch1. Introduction  
W3   Ch2. Brand equity 1/2  
W4   Ch2. Brand equity 2/2  
W5   Ch3. Brand positioning 1/2  
W6   Ch3. Brand positioning 2/2  
W7   Ch4. Equity building elements  
W8   Ch7. Secondary associations  
W9 MID-TERM  
W10  Ch5 & 6. Marketing programs to build equity  
W11 Ch8. Equity measurement system  
W12 Ch9 & 10. Sources and outcomes of equity  
W13 Guest Speaker  
W14 Ch11 & 12. Branding strategies  
W15 Ch13 – 15. Brand management over time and place  
W16 FINAL  
W17 Independent study  
W18 Independent study

methodologies.note: Selected cases from Harvard Business School cases for class presentation and discussions.

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【BAU0021  Marketing Management】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
